name: Kitchen
longDesc:
You are in the kitchen for the first time.
The pantry is behind a curtain on the north wall.
There is a refrigerator, pulled a bit away from the wall, on the east wall.
There is a counter with a giant inset sink on the south wall.
There is a screw on the ground behing the fridge, it is hidden until you examine the refrigerator.
description:
You are in the kitchen.
The pantry is behind a curtain on the north wall.
There is a refrigerator, pulled a bit away from the wall, on the east wall.
There is a counter with a giant inset sink on the south wall.
There is a screw on the ground behing the fridge, it is hidden until you examine the refrigerator.

refrigerator.name: refrigerator
refrigerator.description: This is the refrigerator, it is one of the few normal appliances in the house. There should be a screw around here somewhere.

countertop.name: countertop
countertop.description: The countertop is made of plastic but look like marble. It has a bowl of fruit, a notepad, a phone. There is large sink that is piled high with dirty dishes.

screw.name: screw
screw.description: The screw is old and has a thin film of some sort of goo on it. You need this to fix the shrink ray. It sis hidden until the refrigerator is examined.

magnet.name: magnet
magnet.description: This magnet hangs on the refrigerator. It's shaped like a panda and it's a souvenir from the San Diego Zoo. They're members.
